entries.text: Thank you for calling Ace Hardware! Please hold while we connect you with an agent.
Hi, I was hoping to find out what time your store opens and closes. I'm planning a trip later.
Good morning! Thanks for calling Ace Hardware. Our standard opening time is 7:00 AM and we're open until 8:00 PM every weekday. Are you planning to visit us on a weekend?
Yes, I was actually planning on coming Saturday. What are your weekend hours?
Our weekend hours are slightly different. On Saturdays, we're open from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and on Sundays, we're open from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Okay, that's good to know. And what about parking? Is there decent parking availability at your location?
Yes, we have a large parking lot right in front of the store. Parking availability is generally very good, even during peak hours. You shouldn't have any trouble finding a spot.
Perfect! That's all I needed to know. Thanks so much for your help!
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Have a great day, and we look forward to seeing you at Ace Hardware!
